decks.notes: The deck focuses on using low-cost and efficient spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Murktide Regent and Dragon's Rage Channeler. The deck also utilizes cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency in drawing the right cards and staying ahead in tempo. With a mix of disruptive spells like Fatal Push and counters like Force of Will, the deck aims to assert dominance early in the game and maintain control until victory is achieved.

The main focus of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly deploy powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Chalice of the Void. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Devourer of Destiny and It That Heralds the End while also utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and lands like Ancient Tomb. The inclusion of cards like Wasteland helps to disrupt the opponent's mana base, giving the Eldrazi player a strategic advantage in the match.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's resources while generating card advantage and tempo through interaction and efficient threats. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Will and Daze, while also pressuring them with aggressive creatures like Uro and Brazen Borrower. The use of cards like Brainstorm and Ponder helps the player filter through their deck to find the right answers to stay ahead in the game. By efficiently utilizing these tools, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling a board of powerful Eldrazi creatures and using disruptive spells like Chalice of the Void and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategies. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggressive plays and disrupt their game plan to secure a quick victory. The Eldrazi creatures in the deck have powerful abilities that can quickly close out the game if left unchecked, making it a formidable force in the Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This Grixis Aggro deck focuses on card advantage, disruption, and pressure to overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing powerful creatures like Delver of Secrets and Murktide Regent, along with efficient removal like Fatal Push and Force of Will, the deck aims to control the board while still applying pressure. The inclusion of disruptive elements like Daze and Wasteland further adds to this strategy, allowing the deck to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast tempo. Overall, the deck seeks to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent in order to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on generating massive amounts of mana through Cloudpost ramp cards and utilizing Crop Rotation to find key lands like The One Ring and Planar Nexus. The goal is to quickly assemble the Cloudpost mana engine to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog or lock the opponent out of the game with Karn, the Great Creator. Disruptor Flute can also disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Once Upon a Time and Vexing Bauble help dig for key pieces to combo off and overwhelm the opponent.

The deck revolves around utilizing the combo pieces of Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to create a loop where you can draw your entire deck. You then use Grist, the Hunger Tide and Living Wish to win the game by milling your opponent out or by attacking with large creatures like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The deck also includes powerful control elements like Force of Will and Assassin's Trophy to disrupt your opponent's game plan while you assemble your combo. It's a versatile and powerful deck that can win through different avenues.
